Summary: two red lights coming from the nrth west going over the apt complex
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out on the porch to check on the cat and when I looked up saw two red light coming from the north west they were steady coming at me in a straight line. When they got closer they were two of them one was further than the other there was no sound. at first I thought balloons but I heard no sound no flames they were a solid lights they moved over the complex and I went out side to follow and they both headed south east the out of sight the red lights faded
